item.description:
Join fellow Newcomers member, Ryan, as he hosts the brand spanking new trivia night at Marley's! The trivia starts at 7pm and runs until approximately 9pm .

Marley's focus is on fresh foods and tropical drinks. Trivia teams can enjoy half-priced appetizers, $2 shots, $5 Jack and Cokes, and $5 Captain and Cokes.

Hope to see you there =)

Parking hint: If you can't find parking near Thayer, I usually am able to find a spot in the Citizen's Bank (Brook St) parking lot.

PS. Ryan is still hosting trivia @ Luxe on Thursdays at 9pm so check him out then too!
item.how_to_find_us: ask the trivia host, Ryan, where we are or message me for my #
item.name: Trivia @ Marley's
